sentences: Uuden viruksen leviäminen aiheutti suurta huolta. (The spread of the new virus caused great concern.)
Metsäpalon leviäminen oli nopeaa tuulen takia. (The spreading of the forest fire was rapid due to the wind.)
Tiedot leviämisestä olivat epätarkkoja. (Information about the spread was inaccurate.)
context: Leviäminen is a verbal noun derived from the verb 'levitä', which means 'to spread'. It refers to the process of something expanding or becoming widely distributed. The word can be used in various contexts, such as the spread of diseases, information, or fires. As indicated by the dictionary definition, it declines like a typical Finnish noun of type 38/nainen and has different forms depending on its grammatical case (nominative, genitive, partitive etc.) and possessor.
